categories: Category:Cut content from Star Wars: The Old Republic
Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Ro'tahn was a Human male Jedi Master serving the Jedi Order and the  Galactic Republic. Ro'tahn was stationed on Corellia during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. During his time on Corellia he taught Republic individuals the skill of Treasure Hunting.
Ro'tahn appears only in the game files for Star Wars: The Old Republic as his character was cut from the game. Ro'tahn's file can be found on Jedipedia.
